install.name: AcyMailing: display a squeeze page on site entry
install.author: Acyba
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009-2016 ACYBA SAS - All rights reserved..
install.description: This plugin enables you to display an acymailing's subscription form in a squeeze page when a user enter your site

param.name: help
param.label: Help
param.description: Click on the help button to get some help

param.name: system
param.label: Reset
param.description: Reset the popup's timer for your web browser

param.name: interval
param.label: Number of days before displaying again the popup
param.description: Number of days before displaying again the popup if the user did not subscribe previously

param.name: moduleid
param.label: Id of acymailing's subscription module
param.description: Number associated to acymailing's subscription module in the database

param.name: lists
param.label: Lists
param.description: Do not open the Squeeze Page if the user is already subscribed to at least one of the selected lists

param.name: timer
param.label: Timer
param.description: Delay (in seconds) before showing the squeeze page

param.name: incpages
param.label: Included Menu IDs
param.description: Enter the Menu IDs separated by a comma where the popup will be displayed. If left empty, AcyMailing may display it on all pages

param.name: expages
param.label: Excluded Menu IDs
param.description: Enter the Menu IDs separated by a comma where the popup should NOT be displayed.

param.name: dispmobile
param.label: Display on mobile
param.description: Do you want the squeezepage to be displayed on mobiles as well?

param.name: design
param.label: Design file
param.description: Specify here your custom file name added to the media/com_acymailing/plugins/squeezepage/ directory and Acy will use it
